data.name: Haunted Mansion
data.detailed_description:
Main features:

  • Haunted Mansion - is a horror game in the first person where you will have to discover many mysteries.

  • [In total immersion: Scary atmosphere, low-poly graphics to match the hardware configuration of a maximum of players.
    But the atmosphere will be even more frightening.

  • A haunted mansion with a breathtakingly horrifying past.

  • Gameplay: Walking simulator with many interactions with decorative objects. (drawers, doors, keys, etc.)

  • Psychological horror : You will go to a mansion known to be haunted, in order to do urbex.
    What you film with your camera will leave indelible marks on you.
data.about_the_game:
Main features:

  • Haunted Mansion - is a horror game in the first person where you will have to discover many mysteries.

data.short_description: You are in search of a thrill. You are going to do some urbex, camera in hand, in a mansion with the reputation of being haunted. But the horror will fall on you. The terror of the place will have reason of your mental health

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / AMD HD 6870 or equivalant
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Inte I3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
